sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Indonesian: Tangisan perang untuk keadilan semuanya berakhir - banyak dari kecewa pihak berwenang.
backtrans: The cry of war for justice everything ends - a lot of disappointed authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Indonesian: Keputusan rezim melampaui agenda yang mendasarinya.
backtrans: The decision of the regime surpassed the underlying agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Indonesian: Komunitas cemas atas lewat reformasi yang sangat dibutuhkan.
backtrans: The community is anxious over through reforms that are very much needed.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Indonesian: Think Tank menerbitkan sebuah makalah yang menguraikan permintaan maaf mereka tentang hukuman mati.
backtrans: Think Tank published a paper that outlined their apologies about the death penalty.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
backtrans: Aught remaining from the validity of the petition

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Indonesian: Presiden mendesak para Menteri-Nya untuk mengikat karena dukungan oposisi utama untuk rencana ekonominya hanyalah gesper.
backtrans: The president urged his ministers to bind because the main opposition support for his economic plan was just a buckle.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Indonesian: Para pemilih dibuang untuk melihat tagihan berlalu.
backtrans: The voters were discarded to see the bill passed.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
backtrans: Discursive narratives Lawyers shake the jury.
He was the court ordered violence!

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Indonesian: Blok UE menentang pengenaan akhir dari langkah-langkah anti-dumping.
backtrans: The EU block opposes the final imposition of anti-dumping steps.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Indonesian: Eulogy yang fulsome disampaikan oleh nasihat Sly.
backtrans: The fulsome eulogy was delivered by Sly's advice.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Indonesian: Badan pertunjukan ekonomi memutuskan untuk menghiasi pengembalian uang!
backtrans: Economic shows decide to decorate refunds!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Indonesian: Anggota gerakan revolusioner anti-teokratis menggulingkan rekan-rekannya dalam kekuasaan!
backtrans: Members of the anti-theocrevel revolutionary movement overthrow their colleagues in power!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Indonesian: Pengkhianat mengecewakan memutuskan untuk bertarung dengan para kolonialis.
backtrans: The disappointing traitor decided to fight with the colonialists.
